newsitem.title: USA: Mercantile completes Today's Bancorp deal.
newsitem.headline: Mercantile completes Today's Bancorp deal.

text.p: Mercantile Bancorp Inc said Friday it has completed its $87.3 million acquisition of Today's Bancorp Inc, a Freeport, Illinois-based bank holding company with $519 million in assets.

According to the terms of the merger, Today's Bancorp shareholders will receive a stock distribution of 0.42 Mercantile shares and $11.60 in cash for each share of Today's stock, or a cash distribution of $30.79 per share, Mercantile said.
Shares of Mercantile, an $18.2-billion asset bank holding company, fell 1/8 to 49-1/4 Friday.
